name: Retrieve device credentials
xml:
<get-resource plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='SQL' key="select USER_NAME , PASSWORD , PORT_NUMBER from DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION where VNF_TYPE = $vnf-type " >
<parameter name="nodeName" value="retrieveDeviceCredentials" />

name: Get device interfacing DG
xml:
<get-resource plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='SQL' key="select dg_rpc , module , protocol from DEVICE_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL where VNF_TYPE = $vnf-type and DG_RPC is not null " >
<parameter name="nodeName" value="getDeviceInterfacingDG" />

name: Check if running config exists
xml:
<get-resource plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='SQL' key="select count(1) as value from UPLOAD_CONFIG where VNF_ID = $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id and ( if ( $vnfc-type = '' , VNFC_TYPE is NULL OR VNFC_TYPE = '' , VNFC_TYPE = $vnfc-type ) ) and HOST_IP_ADDRESS = $host-ip-address and CONFIG_INDICATOR = 'Running' AND (pending_delete IS NULL OR pending_delete != 'Y') " force='true' pfx='runningConfig.count'>
<parameter name="nodeName" value="getDBRunningConf" />

name: Insert configuration
xml:
<save plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='SQL' key="INSERT INTO UPLOAD_CONFIG (REQUEST_ID,  ORIGINATOR_ID,  SERVICE_DESCRIPTION,   ACTION,  VNF_ID,  VNF_NAME, VM_NAME,  VNF_TYPE,  VNFC_TYPE,  HOST_IP_ADDRESS,  CONFIG_INDICATOR,  PENDING_DELETE,  CONTENT ) VALUES ( $input.common-header.request-id , $input.common-header.originator-id , $service-description , $input.action , $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id , $vnf-name , $vm-name , $vnf-type , $vnfc-type , $host-ip-address , 'Running' , NULL , $device-running-config ) " force='true' >
<parameter name="nodeName" value="InsertConfiguration" />

name: Update configuration
xml:
<save plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' resource='SQL' key="update UPLOAD_CONFIG set CONTENT = $device-running-config , REQUEST_ID = $input.common-header.request-id , ORIGINATOR_ID = $input.common-header.originator-id ,  SERVICE_DESCRIPTION = $service-description , ACTION = $input.action , UPLOAD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  where VNF_ID = $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id and ( if ( $vnfc-type = '' , VNFC_TYPE is NULL OR VNFC_TYPE = '' , VNFC_TYPE = $vnfc-type ) ) and HOST_IP_ADDRESS = $host-ip-address and CONFIG_INDICATOR = 'Running' AND (pending_delete IS NULL OR pending_delete != 'Y') " force='true' pfx='update'>
<parameter name="nodeName" value="updateConfiguration" />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value='Error while retrieving device credentials' />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Device credentials not found for the ' + $vnf-type `"/>

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value='Error while getting device interfacing DG details' />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Device Interfacing DG mapping not found for the ' + $vnf-type `" />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value='Device Interfacing DG not found' />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Error while quering the running configuration in the repository for vnf-id:' + $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id + ' and Host-ip-address:' + $host-ip-address `"/>

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Error while quering the running configuration in the repository for vnf-id:' + $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id + ' and Host-ip-address:' + $host-ip-address `" />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value='More than one running configuration available for a VNFC' />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Error while updating the running configuration in the repository for vnf-id:' + $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id + ' and Host-ip-address:' + $host-ip-address `" />

name: Set error message
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='node-error-message' value="`'Error while updating the running configuration in the repository for vnf-id:' + $input.action-identifiers.vnf-id + ' and Host-ip-address:' + $host-ip-address `" />

name: Log error
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="error"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="record" value="`$node-error-message`"/>

name: Log error
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="error"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="record" value="`$node-error-message`"/>

name: Log error
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="error"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="record" value="`$node-error-message`"/>

name: set DG parameters
xml:
<set>
<parameter name='config.vnf-type' value="`$vnf-type`" />
<parameter name='config.vnf-name' value="`$vnf-name`" />
<parameter name='config.protocol' value="`$protocol`" />
<parameter name='config.host-ip-address' value="`$host-ip-address`" />
<parameter name='config.user-name' value="`$USER-NAME`" />
<parameter name='config.password' value="`$PASSWORD`" />
<parameter name='config.port-number' value="`$PORT-NUMBER`" />
